sentence.Network_en: Three months before birth babies are already responsive to sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 在出生前3个月，胎儿就已经对声音有反应了。

sentence.Network_en: Harriet was an easy, responsive little girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈丽雅特是一个随和机灵的小女孩。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French responsif, -ive or late Latin responsivus, from respons- 'answered', from the verb respondere (see respond)

entry.tran: 反应敏捷的;易流露感情的;易受影响的
entry.def: A responsive person is quick to react to people or events and to show emotions such as pleasure and affection.

example.ex: Harriet was an easy, responsive little girl...
example.tran: 哈丽雅特是一个随和机灵的小女孩。

example.ex: This is a responsive class with plenty of ideas...
example.tran: 这个班上课反应积极，想法层出不穷。

entry.tran: 反应迅速的;积极响应的
entry.def: If someone or something is responsive, they react quickly and favourably.

example.ex: With an election coming soon, your MP should be very responsive to your request.
example.tran: 选举在即，你的下院议员应当对你的要求作出积极的回应。

entry.def: A responsive action is made as a reaction to something that has just been said or done.

example.ex: At hearing his name spoken, the dog gave a responsive wag of his tail.
example.tran: 听到有人喊它的名字，这条狗摆了摆尾巴。

means.word_mean: 1. containing or using responses or antiphons recited or sung in alternation;
2. readily reacting to people or events; showing emotion;

sentences.sentence: "children are often the quickest and most responsive members of the audience"

means.word_mean: 3. readily reacting to suggestions and influences;
4. susceptible to the feelings or attitudes of others;

sentences.sentence: "keeping government in America responsive to the will of the people"

auth_sentence.content: The sites were built using "responsive design".
auth_sentence.res_content: The sites were built using "responsive design".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sites were built using "responsive design".

auth_sentence.content: Life is a Responsive Design fronting form follows function.
auth_sentence.res_content: Life is a Responsive Design fronting form follows function.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life is a Responsive Design fronting form follows function.

auth_sentence.content: I thought our middle-class customers would be very responsive.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought our middle-class customers would be very responsive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I thought our middle-class customers would be very responsive.

Sentence.sentence: Hong Kong diners are extremely responsive to new ideas or presentations, which is good news for new dishes.
To test how responsive dolphins are to various signals.

means.word_mean: (+to)反应热烈或良好的;赞同的;支持的

sentences.en: She’s fairly responsive to new ideas.
The audience weren’t very responsive and the jokes fell a bit flat.
sentences.cn: 观众反应平平，那些笑话没有太大效果。

means.word_mean: 反应灵敏的;易受控制的

sentences.en: The company is highly responsive to changes in demand.
sentences.cn: 该公司对需求的变化反应特别迅速。

sentences.en: This car’s steering isn’t very responsive.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的方向盘不太灵活。
